00036 #ifndef PACC_Randomizer_hpp_
00037 #define PACC_Randomizer_hpp_
00038 
00039 #include "PACC/Util/MTRand.hpp"
00040 #include <vector>
00041 #include <string>
00042 
00043 namespace PACC {
00044     
00045     using namespace std;
00046     
00059     class Randomizer : protected MTRand {
00060      public:
00067         Randomizer(void) {}
00069         Randomizer(unsigned long int inSeed) : MTRand(inSeed) {}
00071         Randomizer(const vector<unsigned long int>& inSeeds) : MTRand(&inSeeds[0], inSeeds.size()) {}
00073         Randomizer(const string& inState) {setState(inState);}
00074         
00076         unsigned long int operator()(unsigned long inValue) {return randInt(inValue-1);}
00077         
00079         bool getBoolean(void) {return randInt(1);}
00081         unsigned long int getInteger(void) {return randInt();}
00083         unsigned long int getInteger(unsigned long int inValue) {return randInt(inValue);}
00085         long int getInteger(long int inLow, long int inHigh) {return randInt(inHigh-inLow)+inLow;}
00087         double getFloat(void) {return rand();}
00089         double getFloat(const double& inValue) {return rand(inValue);}
00091         double getFloat(const double& inLow, const double& inHigh) {return inLow+rand()*(inHigh-inLow);}
00093         double getFloat53(const double& inLow=0, const double& inHigh=1) {return inLow+rand53()*(inHigh-inLow);}
00095         double getGaussian(const double& inMean=0, const double& inStdDev=1) {return randNorm(inMean, inStdDev);}
00096         
00098         string getState(void) const;
00100         void setState(const string& inState);
00101         
00102     };
00103 
00104     extern Randomizer rand; 
00105 
00106 } // end of PACC namespace                    
00107 
00108 #endif
